description:
In today's life everyone struggles to find themselves and achieve a goal, whether the goal is to lose weight or to be a success, no one knows how to achieve the goals they put in front of themselves. In this lecture I break down the secret formula that I used to change my life over the course of 2 years.

I grew up in a low income family, with a mother who had a serious depression and a father who was a janitor. Both of my parents loved me immensely but the tools were not presented as simple as they were to be successful. Over the course of my life i put together the tools I show you that helped me change my life forever.

If you loved my class please give me a positive review it really does help. If you don't like this course it has a money back guarantee. Just ask and tell me what was it about the course you didn't feel was worth it and I will happily send you your money back.
title: How I Changed My Life From Misery To Mastery
